title: henmark

content: Please look into my Currency exchange topic:Quote from: henmark on April 22, 2022, 01:58:28 PMI am a regular seller of BTC like monthly around $300 to $500.If anyone wants to buy BTC or other cryptocurrency for CASH (Indian Rupees) in Chennai, kindly reply here or PM with telegram ID.I will meet in any public place like restaurant for exchanging.Rates as per: https://wazirx.com/exchange/BTC-INRLooking for regular buyer on monthly basis.
